resources.string: This is the master on/off switch for all of the Phone Tools. Disabling this prevents all of the Answer, Ignore Call and In-Call Screen Guard features from running regardless of whether or not they are enabled below.
This is the master on/off switch for the call answering tools (Answer and Ignore Call features).
Enabling this will allow you to answer incoming calls by pressing down on the camera button.
Answer Call With Track Ball Press
Enabling this will allow you to answer incoming calls by pressing down on the track ball.
Answer Call With Touch Screen Button
Enabling this will display a touch screen button on the answer call screen which you may long press to answer the call with.
Enabling this will display a touch screen button on the answer call screen which you may long press to ignore the call with.

This is the on/off switch for the In-Call Screen Guard tool which places a black screen over the normal in-call screen. Helpful for people who find their cheeks accidentally muting calls, hanging up on calls, dialing numbers in the middle of a call and so on.
Enabling this will turn debug logging on. This will allow you to use log viewing utilities like Log Collector to examine this applications behavior and/or send diagnostic data to the developer.
